Author: Decker#3767
Content: So, about this puzzle i think it some count of dots depended, not words. Bcz if we need to just take "left word" before each dot - there is too many words. And don't clear what we should count as a word, for example in this example `(Head of Security).` ... so, i bet, it's numbers dependent. But here is also a lot of ambiguities ... we can count `.` between `...`, we can count `.` in each paragraph, as @Gawain  guessed, we can count `.` same in paragraphs including / excluding questions itself ... Or ... we can count length of each word before `.` ... 😂  So ... many thing around these `.` that we can count )))
